Developer Kit¶

Python Client¶

By using pip, install the Stupeflix Python Client: pip install stupeflix_api

PHP, Ruby, and Java Clients¶

Zip download: Download

Git download: git clone https://github.com/Stupeflix/Stupeflix-API-Client.git

Checkout the lastest version of these client sources on Stupeflix’s Github. Then follow the instructions on the README file.

Other language¶

Simply use our REST API.
